text: Nothopegia is a genus of plants in the family Anacardiaceae. Species include: * Nothopegia acuminata J.Sinclair * Nothopegia aureofulva Bedd. ex Hook.f. * Nothopegia beddomei Gamble * Nothopegia castanaefolia (Roth) Ding Hou * Nothopegia colebrookeana (Wight) Blume * Nothopegia heyneana (Hook.f.) Gamble * Nothopegia monadelpha (Roxb.) Forman * Nothopegia sivagiriana Murugan & Manickam * Nothopegia travancorica Bedd. ex Hook.f. * Nothopegia vajravelui K.Ravik. & V.Lakshm. ==References== Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Anacardiaceae genera
title: Nothopegia
